title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Specs Decided to Leak Early
description: Not that this should surprise us, knowing how close we are to Samsung Unpacked, but we have reached the point in the Galaxy S25 leak cycle where European retailers are starting to slip by posting information early, it seems. A supposed release of Galaxy S25 specs is here, although they offer the bare minimum level … Continued Read the original post: Samsung Galaxy S25 Specs Decided to Leak Early
author: Kellen
excerpt: Galaxy S25 series specs are reportedly here, but we're wondering how these are an upgrade over the Galaxy S24 models.
text: Samsung Galaxy S25 Specs Decided to Leak Early January 10, 2025 We may earn a commission when you click links to retailers and purchase goods. More info. Not that this should surprise us, knowing how close we are to Samsung Unpacked, but we have reached the point in the Galaxy S25 leak cycle where European retailers are starting to slip by posting information early, it seems. A supposed release of Galaxy S25 specs is here, although they offer the bare minimum level of details. The info shared today of the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 tells the story of a Galaxy S25 series that is incredibly similar to the Galaxy S24 series. Maybe that’s fine, since the S24 was a great set of phones, but if you were looking for a brand new set of specs that might freshen up the scene, you may leave disappointed. Looking at the table below, I’m seeing an upgrade in RAM to 12GB on the base model Galaxy S25 (up from 8GB in the S24) and the move to the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip from last year’s Snapdragon 8 Gen 3. That’s it. Those are literally the only changes you’ll find. We’ll reportedly get almost identical displays, battery capacities and charging speeds, connectivity (still Bluetooth 5.3?), and sizes. Huh. Incoming AI pitch! Incoming AI pitch! Hope you are ready for it. Oh and if you forgot what the Galaxy S25 series looks like, we looked at the devices here. Hit that Galaxy S25 reserve while you can too and save some money. We know you are upgrading. // Android Headlines
html:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Specs Decided to Leak Early

January 10, 2025

We may earn a commission when you click links to retailers and purchase goods. More info.

Not that this should surprise us, knowing how close we are to Samsung Unpacked, but we have reached the point in the Galaxy S25 leak cycle where European retailers are starting to slip by posting information early, it seems. A supposed release of Galaxy S25 specs is here, although they offer the bare minimum level of details.

The info shared today of the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 tells the story of a Galaxy S25 series that is incredibly similar to the Galaxy S24 series. Maybe that’s fine, since the S24 was a great set of phones, but if you were looking for a brand new set of specs that might freshen up the scene, you may leave disappointed.

Looking at the table below, I’m seeing an upgrade in RAM to 12GB on the base model Galaxy S25 (up from 8GB in the S24) and the move to the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip from last year’s Snapdragon 8 Gen 3. That’s it. Those are literally the only changes you’ll find. We’ll reportedly get almost identical displays, battery capacities and charging speeds, connectivity (still Bluetooth 5.3?), and sizes. Huh.

Incoming AI pitch! Incoming AI pitch! Hope you are ready for it.

Oh and if you forgot what the Galaxy S25 series looks like, we looked at the devices here.

Hit that Galaxy S25 reserve while you can too and save some money. We know you are upgrading.

// Android Headlines
